description.en:
"Child, you must survive!"

After the destruction of his House by his uncle, all that was left for a young boy, Boris, was the heirloom sword, Winterer. But little did he know that this treasure would become the cause of another crisis. As people seek Winterer, Boris’ heart grows colder and bleaker, much like the winter.

The adventures of Boris — to survive and to protect the sword of his House — begin now. What awaits him at the end of this journey? And what secrets does the winter sword Winterer hold?

title.en: Ossan Teihen Chiyu-shi to Manasume no Henkyou Life

altTitles.ja: おっさん底辺治癒士と愛娘の辺境ライフ ～中年男が回復スキルに覚醒して、英雄へ成り上がる～

altTitles.en: The Frontier Life of The Low-Class Ossan Healer And The Lovely Girl
The Frontier Life of the Low-Class Old Man Healer and His Beloved Daughter
Old Man, the Low-tier Healer, and the Beloved Daughter's Frontier Life ~A Middle-aged Man Awakens to Healing Skills and Rises to Become a Hero~

description.en: F-rank healer, Reda Dixon (30), is expelled from his party due to his age. Heartbroken, Reda decides on a change of pace by moving to the rural town of Almus. On his journey there, he encounters a blonde-haired girl named Mina, who is dressed in ragged clothes. With no parents in sight, the kind-hearted Reda decides to become her guardian. In Almus, Reda, who starts a new life with the girl, becomes known as "Teacher" by the townspeople, thanks to his unconsciously cheat-level 『Healing Magic』! Together, they solve various troubles and deepen their family bonds.
description.ja: Fランクの治癒士、レダ・ディクソン(30)は、年齢を理由にパーティーから追放されてしまう。傷心のレダは心機一転、田舎町・アムルスへの移住を決意。その道中で、みすぼらしい恰好をしたブロンドヘアの少女・ミナと出会う。アムルスで、少女とともに新生活を始めたレダは、無自覚チートだった『回復魔法』のおかげで町民から“先生”と呼ばれる存在までに!二人は様々なトラブルを解決するとともに、家族の絆を深めていく―。
description.ru: Рэда Диксон, 30 летний лекарь F ранга, который был отстранен от службы из-за возраста. От безысходности он решает переехать в Загородную деревушку Амурт для того, чтобы начать жизнь с чистого листа. По стечениям обстоятельств он встречает Мину, маленькую девочку со светлыми волосами, одетую в одни лохмотья. Родителей у нее нет, поэтому добродушный Рэда становится ей опекуном. Благодаря магии исцеления Рэды, все в поселке называют его "Сенсеем". Рэда и его семья вместе решают проблемы и укрепляют семейные связи.

altTitles.th: สามรั่วตัวแสบ

altTitles.ja: みつどもえ

description.en: The somewhat precocious and sadistic girl Mitsuba, the somewhat lecherous muscle girl Futaba, and the somewhat mysterious gloomy girl Hitoha. Better known as the (mischievous) "Marui Sisters," this is the story of how these triplets go about their days in Class 6-3 with their cute yet wild antics.

The world experienced a cataclysm and monsters are now roaming the Earth. Born out of a necessity to subjugate these monsters, this new era saw the rise of a new profession. Monster Trainers – individuals who conquer, cultivate, and train these monsters. Thus begins the story of Gao Peng. An ambitious young man with dreams of his own, who gets launched right into the golden age of monster cultivation. Gao Peng: “Even if it’s a loach, I’ll be able to evolve it into a dragon that can soar to the heavens!”

Märchen is a young man who was saved from the brink of death by a martial arts master by infusing her Ki into him. However, things take a turn when Märchen has no interest in fighting and aims to live a peaceful life.
His "Master" then decides to make use of his ability to become stronger simply by reading tales and absorbing the techniques used in them. She introduces a huge library, filled with all kinds of books that record different forms of martial arts and techniques, to him.
Märchen picks up a book and begins to read...

altTitles.ja: 勇者が帰ってきた

altTitles.th: สงครามนักรบผู้หวนคืน

description.en:
After saving one world, warrior Kim Minsu returns to Earth only to find that he’s lost everything… so he decides to destroy the world he used to call home.

In his rampage, he kills teenager Jeongsu Park and his family. But instead of dying normally, Jeongsu is transported to another world, where he finds that he’s now a warrior himself. After killing the demon king of this alternate world and honing his skills as a warrior, Jeongsu returns to earth, hell-bent on revenge against Minsu.

As the two warriors fight with the fate of their country in the balance, who will emerge victorious?
description.fr:
Après avoir sauvé un monde, le héros Minsu Kim revient sur Terre et découvre qu'il a tout perdu. Il décide donc de détruire le monde qu'il avait l'habitude d'appeler ‘chez lui’. Dans son saccage, il tue le héros Jeongsu Park, mais au lieu de mourir normalement, Jeongsu est transporté dans un autre monde. Après avoir tué le roi démon de ce monde alternatif et grandi en tant que héros, Jeongsu revient sur terre, déterminé à se venger de Minsu. Alors que les deux héros se battent avec le destin de leur pays en jeu, qui sortira vainqueur?

description.en:
“Those wearing armor shall never take off their arms, will never die, and will live in pain.”

With a witch’s curse, the ‘Cursed Knights’ began to roam the world.

And Enoch, a boy who encounters one, is about to discover what happens to him.

Na Hwa-Jin’s teaching techniques are pretty violent for someone who works in the Ministry of Education.

That being said, when punishments don't seem to work on even the worst of school bullies, there is no better man for the job.

Sometimes you can’t get a good education until those bullies are taught a lesson.


---

**Links:**
- Alternate Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5620215)

**Note:** After the publication of ch. 125, the manhwa was suspended indefinitely and ch. 125 was removed while the official English translation was completely taken down.

description.uk: Після прийняття закону про заборону тілесних покарань у 2011 році, в школах почався суцільний безлад. Учні вчинили масовий переворот, змінивши шкільний устрій, а працівники учбових закладів втратити свій авторитет. На Хваджін, член Бюро захисту освіти, починає «реальну освіту», щоб встановити порядок.
description.pt-br: As técnicas de ensino de Hwajin Na são bastante violentas para quem trabalha no Ministério da Educação. Dito isso, quando as punições não parecem funcionar nem mesmo com o pior dos valentões da escola, não há homem melhor para o trabalho. Às vezes, você não pode obter uma boa educação até que esses valentões aprendam uma lição.

description.en:
When vlogger meets top-of-the-industry writer, what could go wrong? Everything! Nothing has gone my way ever since meeting her.

Hu Luoluo, on the brink of having her vlogger account relinquished, is shoved into the path of scandal-ridden writer extraordinaire Song Li purely by accident. Being featured on hot topics, paired up as a couple, finally gaining traffic... Will it finally make her the greatest vlogger of all time?
description.es-la: Juntos o se hunden juntos, ¿se descubrirán mentiras sobre el amor? Están ligados por negocios, fingiendo ser pareja para contrarrestar los escándalos del escritor y lograr ser el primer lugar en el buscador.

altTitles.fr: Survie pendant la fin du monde

description.en:
A boy was locked in a basement and trained his entire life. His deranged father, the one who confined him, declared, 


“The Apocalypse is coming.” 

Now, armed with the training and survival skills he had honed over years of practice, he must survive the impending apocalypse.
description.pt-br:
Um garoto foi trancado em um bunker e foi treinado a vida inteira. Seu pai perturbado, aquele que o confinou, declarou: 

“O Apocalipse está chegando”.

Agora, armado com o treinamento e as habilidades de sobrevivência que ele havia aprimorado ao longo de anos de prática, ele deve sobreviver ao apocalipse iminente.

description.en:
It's been ten years since the assassination of the Dragon King, the land's most powerful ruler. Off in the corner of the kingdom where tailed dragonfolk dwell, Jio, a human girl, yearns for adventure and an escape from rural life. However, when she meets the mysterious, amnesiac young man Neraid, Jio's life turns upside-down! With courage and curiosity knocking on the door, the two of them find the ultimate adventure waiting for them!! A traditional battle fantasy from a rookie artist begins!! (K MANGA)

'Cha Ju-young' is imprisoned in a juvenile detention center for rendering his gangster father comatose.
Not long after, the father, who was thought never to wake up, comes to visit...

description.en:
While getting a nighttime snack, the female artist Xin Xin accidentally saves Yin Yin, a wasted rich girl. She gives her a bath, changes her clothes, and even makes her a bowl of *suantang* noodles after much wheedling...

After multiple attempts at rebuffing her forward advances, Xin Xin ends up letting the "homeless" Yin Yin stay with her as she needs a roommate.

Social and beautiful, Yin Yin breaks the ice bit by bit with the strict and independent Xin Xin... Their yuriful table for two starts becoming available now!

---

description.en:
Uehara-kun, who loves 2D, dreams of becoming a comic artist one day! However, his dream is threatened when an editor rejects his work as too boring.

The next day, while contemplating giving up on his dream, a gal in his class, Miyamoto Niina, sees his manuscript, and a too-close pseudo-romance for the sake of their comics begins!?

This is a comic artists × youth romantic comedy!
description.id: Uehara-kun menyukai karakter 2 dimensi dan mempunyai cita-cita menjadi mangaka! Namun, mimpinya pupus saat seorang editor menolak manga-nya karena bikin ngantuk. Besoknya, dia berencana membuang manga yang ditolak tersebut, namun, salah satu gadis dari kelasnya, Miyamoto Niina, mengetahui manga hasil buatannya, timbulah kisah komedi-romantis yang terjalin dari sebuah manga!
description.ja:
2次元をこよなく愛する上原くんの夢は漫画家！

ある日、同じクラスのギャル宮本さんに自分の原稿を見られたことで漫画のための距離感近すぎ疑似恋愛、開始!?

漫を持して描く漫画家×青春ラブコメディ！！
description.vi:
Uehara-kun là một thằng rất thích gái 2D và ước mơ làm hoạ sĩ Manga! Tuy nhiên, giấc mơ của anh ta lại ngay lập tức bị đạp đổ khi bị một biên tập viên nhận xét rằng tác phẩm này nhìn chán chả buồn nói.

Tưởng như anh đã định từ bỏ giấc mơ của mình thì một cô gái trong lớp của anh, Miyamoto Niina, nhìn thấy bản phác thảo của cậu ấy và muốn bắt đầu một mối tình tưởng lãng mạn nhưng ai ngờ là giả tạo, để giúp cậu hoàn thành được bộ manga của mình!

Một bộ manga về Mangaka ✖ Romcom tuổi mới lớn!
description.pt-br:
Uehara-kun, que adora 2D, sonha em se tornar um mangaká um dia! No entanto, seu sonho é ameaçado quando um editor rejeita seu trabalho por considerá-lo muito chato.

No dia seguinte, enquanto pensa em desistir de seu sonho, uma garota de sua turma, Miyamoto Niina, vê seu manuscrito, e um pseudo-romance muito próximo para o bem de seus mangás começa!?

Esta é uma comédia romântica juvenil de quadrinistas!

description.en:
Following a momentous battle against giants for the fate of the world, Ronan emerges victorious as the last man standing of the Imperial Army. As he laments this hollow victory with his dying commander, Grand Marshal Adeshan, they quickly learn that the war is far from over and an overwhelming force of giants descends from the heavens.

Fearing the worst, yet seeing hope in the courageous Ronan, Adeshan uses her last time slip to send him back to the past, so that he can enroll in the prestigious Phileon Academy and become the strongest swordsman the empire has ever seen!

The strongest hero of humanity, Kim Sung Bin.

He threw everything on the line and fought… but he still couldn’t prevent the destruction of the world.

However, his legend has just begun as he returns 20 years into the past.

“I’ll definitely… kill it this time.”

Now fully equipped with overwhelming power and experience, the hero’s raid isn’t over yet!
description.ko:
인류 최강의 영웅, 김성인
모든 것을 내던지며 분투했지만
결국…… 세상의 멸망은 막지 못했다

하지만 그의 전설은 이제 시작이었으니
성인, 20년 전으로 회귀하다!

“이번에는…… 반드시 잡는다.”

압도적인 재능과 경험으로 무장한 완전체
영웅의 레이드는 아직 끝나지 않았다!
description.ru: Сильнейший герой человечества Ким Сон Бин. Он бросил все на кон и сражался, но… не cмог предотвратить разрушение мира. Однако его легенда только начинается, когда Сон Бин возвращается на 20 лет в прошлое.
description.pt-br:
O herói mais forte da humanidade, Kim Sung Bin.

Ele jogou tudo na linha e lutou... mas ele ainda não conseguiu impedir a destruição do mundo.

No entanto, sua lenda apenas começou quando ele retorna 20 anos no passado.

"Com certeza... vou matá-lo desta vez."

Agora totalmente equipado com poder e experiência esmagadores, o ataque do herói ainda não acabou!

altTitles.ja: 願いのアストロ

description.en:
The new series from Ken Wakui, the creator of Shinjuku Swan and Tokyo Revengers!

As the battle to decide the next leader of the Yotsurugi gang that runs Asakusa is heating up, a meteorite strike suddenly awakens superpowers in the people of Japan. How will Hibaru Yotsurugi, the son of the previous gang leader, come out of this?!
description.fr: Le nouveau manga de Ken Wakui, le créateur de Shinjuku Swan et Tokyo Revengers ! Alors que la bataille pour désigner le prochain chef du clan Yotsurugi qui dirige Asakusa s'intensifie, la chute d'une météorite réveille soudainement des super-pouvoirs chez les Japonais. Comment Hibaru Yotsurugi, le fils du précédent boss du clan va-t-il s'en sortir ?

description.en:
"Castle", South Korea's omnipotent crime syndicate. One man returns to Korea in order to topple the absolute stronghold that is "Castle". Kim Shin, the Korean-born Russian killer named "Amur Tigro".  
He comes back to the crime-ridden city of Hoe-Am in accordance with the last will of his mentor, Kang Min Sung. Kim Shin and his comrades put their lives on the line as they head for the final showdown…

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=736744)

---
**Official Translations:** [Chinese (Traditional Characters) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/shonen/castle/list?title_no=3797),  [Indonesian / Bahasa](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/castle/list?title_no=2078), [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001034)
description.pl:
,,Castle'' - południowokoreański syndykat przestępczy.  
Pewien człowiek powraca do Korei, by obalić absolutną fortecę, którą jest ,,Twierdza''. Kim Shin - urodzony w Korei rosyjski zabójca o imieniu Amur Tiger (tygrys). Wraca on do zbrodniczego miasta Hoeam zgodnie z ostatnią wolą swojego mistrza Kang Min-Seong'a. Kim Shin i jego partnerzy zmierzają się do ostatecznego starcia i stawiają swoje życie na szali…
description.ru: “Замок”, Южно-Корейский всемогущий криминальный синдикат. Один человек вернулся в Корею, чтобы свергнуть тиранию под названием “Замок”. Ким Шин - родившийся в Корее, русский убийца по прозвищу “Амурский тигр ”. Он возвращается в управляемый преступностью Хоям, чтобы исполнить последнюю волю своего наставника, Кан Мин-Сона. Ким Шин и его товарищи рискуют своими жизнями, неуклонно приближаясь к решающему сражению…

description.en:
In the Era of Adventure kickstarted by the spawning of Gates, marked by absolute hopelessness, destitute, desperation, and despair, everyone had given up their hope and lost their courage to continue fighting - except one adventurer that refused to go down until his last breath.

"You are the only one left, Last Adventurer Elpam."

As the history of adventurers was forced to come to an end, the Last Adventurer returned to where this story all began.

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢転生おじさん

altTitles.en: The Old Man Reincarnated as a Villainess

altTitles.es-la: El Viejo que Reencarno como la Villana

altTitles.ru: Перерождение Мужчины Средних Лет в Дочь Дворянина

description.en: After a traffic accident, 52-year-old civil servant Kenzaburou Tondabayashi awakens to find he's become Grace Auvergne, a duke's daughter, and more importantly the villainess of an otome game. Not wanting to get in the way of the happy endings of the young characters around him, Grace sets out to play the role of the villain, but whether it's due to Kenzaburou's memories of being an affectionate parent getting in the way or not being able to remember those pesky foreign names properly, it ends up being a lot harder than it looks…
description.id:
Setelah mengalami sebuah kecelakaan, seorang PNS berusia 52 tahun bernama kenzaburou tondabayashi tiba-tiba berada di tubuh seorang putri duke yang bernama grace auvergne, terlebih lagi, grace merupakan seorang villainess di sebuah game otome. Tidak ingin mengganggu happy ending anak-anak muda yang ada di dekatnya, grace memutuskan untuk menjalankan perannya sebagai seorang villainess, tapi mungkin karena ingatan kenzaburou yang dulunya merupakan seorang orang tua yang penuh kasih sayang atau karena tidak bisa mengingat nama-nama asing, akhirnya setiap grace ingin menjalankan peran villainessnya, grace selalu terganggu.
Sehingga dia merasa menjadi seorang villainess ternyata lebih sulit dari yang dia pikirkan...
description.ja: 52歳の真面目な公務員・屯田林憲三郎は交通事故に遭う。気が付いたらそこは学園舞台の乙女ゲームのような世界…しかも校内一高飛車なオーヴェルヌ侯爵家の令嬢グレイスに転生してしまい!?
description.es-la: Tras perder el conocimiento, después de realizar un acto heroico, el oficinista de 52 años, Kenzaburou Tondabayashi, despertó como Grace Auvergne, la hija de un duque perteneciente a un juego Otome y a su vez la villana de la historia. En un afán de querer cumplir su rol como villana para no afectar la historia del mundo, verá cómo su carácter de padre amoroso y de persona amable harán que su objetivo sea más difícil de lo que esperaba...

altTitles.es-la: Convertí a my amigo de la infancia (♂) en una chica

altTitles.id: Gue Ubah Teman Masa Kecil (♂) Gue Jadi Cewek

altTitles.en: I Think I Turned My Childhood Friend (♂) Into a Girl
How to Make a "Girl" Fall in Love

altTitles.ja-ro: Osananajimi (♂) wo Onnanoko ni Shiteshimatta Hanashi

altTitles.pt-br: Transformei meu amigo de infância (♂) em uma garota

altTitles.ja: 幼馴染（♂）を女の子にしてしまった話
恋する（おとめ）の作り方

altTitles.en: I Think I Turned My Childhood Friend Into a Girl

altTitles.th: เมคอัปรักเสกนายให้สวยปิ๊ง

description.en: A popular guy who's secretly interested in cosmetics asks to practice makeup on his dull childhood friend... and he ends up looking cute?!
description.id: Seorang siswa SMA yang populer diam-diam suka dunia kosmetik, dan meminta teman masa kecilnya yang dekil untuk latihan dandan… tapi, teman masa kecilnya malah jadi imut!?
description.es-la: Un muchacho popular que en secreto está interesado en cosméticos le pide a su amigo simplón dejarlo maquillarle para practicar… ¿¡Y termina viéndose bello(a)!?
description.pt-br: Um garoto popular que está secretamente interessado em cosméticos pede para praticar maquiagem em seu amigo de infância … e ele acaba ficando uma Linda Garota ?!

altTitles.en: Youngest Son of the Renowned Swordsmanship Clan
The Youngest Son of a Renowned Family of Swordsmen
Youngest Son of the Renowned Swordsmanship Clan

altTitles.es-la: El hijo menor del maestro de la espada

description.en:
Jin Runcandel was destined to become the head of his swordmaster clan. But despite his best efforts, he's banished for his shoddy swordsmanship. Though Jin eventually makes a contract with the god Solderet and is freed from the curse that hindered his abilities, he meets a rather unfortunate end. In the next moment, however, he awakens as a baby, long before his tragedy began.

Armed with a second chance and some new powers, Jin swears to fulfill his destiny and become the ultimate swordmaster!
description.ko:
진 룬칸델
대륙 최고의 검술명가, 룬칸델의 막내아들
룬칸델 역사상 최악의 둔재

비참하게 쫓겨나 허무한 최후를 맞이한 그에게
다시 한 번 기회가 주어졌다.

“너는 이 힘을 어떻게 사용하고 싶더냐?”
“저를 위해 사용하고 싶습니다.”

전생의 기억과 압도적인 재능, 그리고 신과의 계약

최강이 될 준비는 끝났다.

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UspJjUOFrFQ)

title.en: The Heavenly Demon Destroys the Lich King's Murim

altTitles.ru: Небесный Демон уничтожает Мурим короля Лича

description.en:
An unknown voice disturbed me while I was levitating during my cultivation to reach the transcendent demonic state.

My concentration had been broken, and I fell into an unconscious, overloaded state. When I awoke a month later, the Lich King had already taken control of the Murim.

After the battle that ended with the destruction of the Heavenly Demon Cult, I awoke a hundred and forty years later in a Murim where magic and martial arts coexisted.

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%B2%9C%EB%A7%88-%EB%A6%AC%EC%B9%98%EC%99%95%EC%9D%98-%EB%AC%B4%EB%A6%BC%EC%9D%84-%EB%B6%80%EC%88%98%EB%8B%A4/2583)
description.ko:
신마경의 경지에 도달하기 위해 발을 띄우던 중 알 수 없는 전음이 방해하기 시작했다.
결국 집중력이 흐트러져 주화입마에 빠져 쓰러지고,
한달 후 눈을 떠보니 이계에서 '리치왕'이란 자가 넘어와 무림을 뒤엎어 버린 후였다.
천마신교마저 뒤엎어버린 리치왕과의 대결을 마치고

140년이 지난 후 깨어난 무림은 무공과 마법이 공존하고 있었다.

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%B2%9C%EB%A7%88-%EB%A6%AC%EC%B9%98%EC%99%95%EC%9D%98-%EB%AC%B4%EB%A6%BC%EC%9D%84-%EB%B6%80%EC%88%98%EB%8B%A4/2583)
description.ru:
Голос неизвестного беспокоил меня, когда я практиковался во время своего совершенствования, чтобы достичь трансцендентного демонического состояния. 

Моя концентрация была нарушена, и я потерял сознание. Когда я проснулся месяц спустя, Король-лич уже взял под свой контроль весь Мурим. 

После битвы, которая закончилась разрушением Культа Небесного Демона, я проснулся сто сорок лет спустя в Муриме, где сосуществовали магия и боевые искусства (ред.)

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%B2%9C%EB%A7%88-%EB%A6%AC%EC%B9%98%EC%99%95%EC%9D%98-%EB%AC%B4%EB%A6%BC%EC%9D%84-%EB%B6%80%EC%88%98%EB%8B%A4/2583)

altTitles.ja: 搾り取らないで、女商人さん

description.en:
Tartaros: A mysterious and massive underground dungeon. There, adventurers are engaged in a night and day struggle to find the treasure they seek. Lavi the New Adventurer is taking on the challenge of Tartaros, but has a problem. A renowned dark merchant, Philo the Beastkin, is pestering him to buy her strange items! She pushes items (often erotic) onto Lavi for him to use in every situation they come across. 

What will become of Lavi’s adventures?! Is he willing to buy anything from this adorably annoying merchant girl?!   

This is a fantasy comic with a teasing merchant!!
description.es:
el Misterioso laberinto subterráneo gigante "Tartaros".   
  
Allí, los aventureros de día y de noche se aventuran en  
buscan tesoros y otras riquezas. El aventurero novato Lavi (shota) que desafió el calabozo "tartaros" y que para su mala suerte se mete en algunos problemas, Es en ese instante cuando conoció a la mitad bestia Philo (ponkotsu), con quien hace un trato para ser su cliente habitual.  
¿Qué pasará con la aventura de Lavi? ¡seguirá Comprándole ítem   
a esta belleza y hermosa!  
  
¡¡¡la comedia de fantasía sobre el aventurero novato Lavi (shota)   
y la comerciante mitad bestia Philo (ponkotsu)!!

title.en: Rebirth in the End Times: I Reached the Top by Opening Boxes

altTitles.zh: 末世重生：我靠开箱子问鼎巅峰

description.en:
Jiang Xiaoyong was betrayed and killed by a green tea girl in the apocalypse, but was accidentally resurrected a year ago and obtained the blind box system. 

He was always one step ahead of others, collecting supplies and spending a fortune to build a safe house before the apocalypse. He became stronger through the system and avenged his enemies in his previous life. 

From then on, he embarked on the road to the king's counterattack.

The family crumbled like a sand castle in the blink of an eye after their father's suicide. I became the head of the family and had to take responsibility for my mother who lost her mind and my blind little sister who goes to a special school. For the sake of my family, I'm going to start my own gang at the strongest gang school in Busan. Hot action for a cold world.
description.ru: Семья рассыпалась в мгновение ока, словно замок из песка, после самоубийства отца. Я стал главой семьи и мне пришлось взять ответственность за потерявшую рассудок мать и слепую младшую сестру, которая ходит в специальную школу. Ради семьи я собираюсь создать свою собственную банду в самой сильной гангстерской школе в Пусане. Горячий экшн для холодного мира.

altTitles.ja: 気になってる人が男じゃなかった

altTitles.ja-ro: Ki ni Natteru Hito ga Otoko Janakatta

altTitles.fr: Le garçon qui l'intéressait n'en était en fait pas un

altTitles.ru: Парень, которым она увлечена, на самом деле не парень

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ zàiyì de rén bùshì yìxìng

altTitles.ja-ro: Kininatteru Hito ga Otoko ja Nakatta

description.az: Bu twitter qısa hekayəsi məktəbdən kənarda oğlan kimi səhv saldığı orta məktəbli qızla onun sinif yoldaşı arasındakı sevgi hekayəsini təsvir edir. Nəhayət,qızlar rok musiqisindəki ortaq zövqləri üzərində birləşirlər.
description.en:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He’s got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know — this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya’s, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other’s crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question — but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn’t be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***
description.fr:
Une histoire très appréciée sur Twitter sur fond de musique de Rock.

Aya, une populaire lycéenne tombe sous le charme du discret vendeur du magasin de musique qu'elle fréquente.

Retour en classe, elle raconte toute l'histoire à ses amies et comment elle a un faible pour ce garçon aux airs de prince charmant.

Ce qu'elle ne sait pas c'est que ce mystérieux vendeur n'est en fait que sa voisine de bureau , Mitsuki, qu'elle a confondu pour un jeune homme.

Comment leur relation va-t-elle évolué ? Arriveront elles à expliquer ce quiproquo ?
description.id:
Series Pendek Twitter yang menggambarkan cerita tentang Gyaru dan Teman Sekelasnya.
Gyaru yang suka musik rock dan sering mendatangi toko kaset jatuh cinta ke pekerja paruh waktu yang bekerja disitu, tapi sedikit dia tahu ternyata pekerjanya itu perempuan dan teman sekelasnya.
description.tr: Süslünün tekinin hoşlandığı çocuk aslında sınıftaki sessiz kız çıkıyor.
description.uk: Популярна серія коротких манґ у твіттері, в якій розповідається про історію кохання між ґяру та її однокласницею, яку вона помилково сприймає як хлопця поза школою, через їхню взаємну любов до рок-музики.
description.pt-br:
Uma Gyaru/Gal que não se parece tanto com suas amigas (Gyarus também) frequenta uma loja de CD's e se apaixona pelo funcionário(?) de meio período do local.
Mas mal sabe ela que o funcionário(?) na realidade é uma menina e é uma das suas colegas de classe.

title.en: The Dungeon Cleaning Life of a Once Genius Hunter

altTitles.en: The Sagacious Cleaning Life of a Returned Genius Hunter

altTitles.ru: Мудрая уборка жизни вернувшегося охотника за гениями

altTitles.en: Clever Cleaning Life Of The Returned Genius Hunter

description.en:
World’s first SSS-ranked genius hunter, Kim Jun-woo.

He regresses ten years into the past after being ambushed by unknowns one day. With all his hunter skills now locked, he must fulfill his career as a dungeon cleaner to unlock them.

But this cleaner… is extraordinary!

The once renowned hunter, Kim Jun-woo, takes over the cleaning duty with vigorous determination.
description.fr:
Kim Jun-Woo, le premier chasseur de génie de rang SSS au monde.

Il est un utilisateur incroyable de capacité, mais sa personnalité horrible conduit à des problèmes avec sa réputation.

Au milieu de ses problèmes, il a été attaqué et tué par un groupe non identifié.

Quand il a ouvert les yeux, il était retourné dans le passé, il y a 10 ans.

Bien qu’il essaie de redevenir un chasseur et d’élever son rang, ses compétences ont toutes été scellées par le karma de sa vie antérieure.

Pour le libérer, il doit travailler comme « nettoyeur de donjon », un métier réputé pour être extrêmement dur dans cette industrie !

Mais ce nettoyeur, il est différent !
description.ko:
세계 최초 SSS랭크 천재 헌터 김준우.
대단한 능력자지만, 인정머리가 없는 탓에 평판에 문제가 생긴다.
골머리를 썩히고 있는 와중, 정체를 알 수 없는 집단에게 습격받아 죽게 되고,
눈을 떠보니 10년 전 시점으로 회귀한 상태.

다시 헌터가 되어 랭크를 올리려 했지만, 이전 생의 업보로 인해 스킬을 모두 봉인 당하고,
해제를 위해서는 업계에선 극한 직업으로 유명한 '던전 청소부'로 일을 해야 하는데?!

하지만 이 청소부, 남다르다!
몬스터는 물론이거니와, 골깝떠는 헌터, 자리만 차지하는 낙하산 상사, 심지어 동료가 될 사람까지
모든 걸 청소할 기세로 깽판을 치는데...

현직 헌터보다 더 강한 전직 헌터의 망나니식 청소가 시작된다!
description.pt-br:
Kim Jun-woo, o primeiro caçador genial de rank SSS.

Ele é um incrível usuário de habilidades, mas sua personalidade horrível trás problemas para sua reputação.

No meio de seus problemas, ele foi atacado e morto por um grupo não identificado. E quando abriu os olhos, havia retornado 10 anos para seu passado.

Embora ele tente voltar a ser um caçador e aumentar seu rank, as habilidades dele foram seladas pelo karma de sua vida passada.

Para conseguir libertar suas habilidades, ele precisa trabalhar como um “Limpador de Dungeons”, que tem a fama de ser incrivelmente difícil! Mas esse faxineiro, ele é diferente!

Não apenas monstros – caçadores problemáticos, superiores conseguindo suas posições por puro nepotismo, e até mesmo seus colegas.

Ele está fazendo a maior bagunça para limpar tudo. O ex-caçador, que é mais forte do que os caçadores atuais, e sua limpeza maluca vão começar!

title.en: Shitsuji-sama wa Demodori Reijou wo Amayakasanai

altTitles.ja: 執事様は出戻り令嬢を甘やかさない

description.en: After Akiko is cheated on by the boyfriend she's living with, she has no choice but to return to her parents' home. At home for the first time in several years none of her family is there, only Tanaka, a handsome but brazen butler! Akiko is hesitant to rely on someone she's met for the first time, but she ends up being taken in by Tanaka, who is surprisingly kind(?). Their life together full of ups and downs now begins!?

altTitles.th: ดรูอิดแห่งสถานีโซล

altTitles.ja: ドルイド侵略

altTitles.es-la: Druida de la Estación de Seúl

description.de:
Was wie ein gewöhnlicher Tag begann, wird auf den Kopf gestellt, als eine mysteriöse Katastrophe die Erde heimsucht und Soo Ho Park auf einen anderen Planeten befördert. Mit der Zeit lernt er, sich anzupassen und um sein Überleben in dieser fremden Welt zu kämpfen. Doch eines Tages wird Soo Ho genauso plötzlich wieder auf die Erde zurückgeholt, wie er auf dem neuen Planeten gelandet ist. Schnell erfährt er, dass eine Rückkehr zu seinem vergangenen Leben nicht möglich ist, denn die Erde befindet sich in einem ständigen Kampf mit Monstern, denen es gelungen ist, den Planeten zu infiltrieren. Wie wird Soo Ho gegen die Monster ankämpfen und wird er dieses Mal mit seinen derzeitigen Fähigkeiten überleben können?

description.en:
What started out as an ordinary day turned upside down when an unknown catastrophe struck Earth, transporting Suho Park to a different planet. He eventually learns how to adapt and fight for his survival in this foreign world, but one day, just as suddenly as he was sucked into this new planet, Suho is pulled back to Earth!

 He quickly learns that return to life as he remembers it is no longer possible, as Earth is in constant battle with monsters who’ve managed to infiltrate the planet.

How will Suho fight against the monsters attacking Earth, and will he be able to survive this time with his current skills?

description.fr:
Ce qui a commencé comme une journée ordinaire a basculé lorsqu'une catastrophe inconnue a frappé la Terre, transportant Suho Park sur une autre planète. Ce dernier apprend peu à peu à s'adapter et à se battre pour survivre dans ce monde étranger, mais un jour, tout aussi soudainement qu'il a été transporté sur cette nouvelle planète, Suho est miraculeusement ramené sur Terre. Il apprend rapidement que le retour à la vie normale telle qu'il se souvient n'est plus possible, car la Terre est en lutte constante avec des monstres qui ont réussi à s'infiltrer sur la planète. Suho trouvera-t-il un moyen de se battre contre les monstres qui attaquent la Terre, et pourra-t-il survivre avec ses compétences actuelles ?

그 사이 세상은 몬스터의 등장으로 철저한 약육강식의 세상으로 변해 있었다.

从现在开始出击征服世界！
朴修浩意外来到异世界后，在千年的生存竞争中成功存活并成为了动物之王。时隔千年又意外重返地球。 在此期间，世界因为怪兽的出现，而彻底变成了弱肉强食的世界。为了继续生存朴修浩开始征服人类世界！

description.en: First among the ten martial emperors, Peerless Martial Emperor Gu Fei Yang met his demise in the Tiandang mountains. He was reincarnated fifteen years later, as Li Yun Xiao of the Tianshui Nation, and thus began a heaven-defying battlefront with the countless talents of the current generation. Martial arts of the nine heavens and ten divine realms. From then on, the whole world was set ablaze.
description.es-la: Gu Feiyan, el tercer soberano, muere y es reencarnado en un niño llamado Li Yunxia, una completa basura que todavía no despertó sus meridianos a pesar de su edad. ¡Pero esto no detendrá al MC de alcanzar el pináculo de este mundo otra vez!

altTitles.en: I Used to Be a Boss

description.en: Baphomet is the ruthless, dispassionate lord of the Abyssal Tower, a mysterious, monster-filled dungeon plaguing the human world. Many Hunters seek to defeat him and bring the tower down to no avail. Despite his demonic power, Baphomet grows curious about humanity. One day, Baphomet is defeated by Raven, the strongest Hunter, and realizes that his true wish is to be just like the humans he previously looked down on. In death, he is granted his wish, as he awakens as a human – without his powers!
description.fr:
Baphomet, le boss de la , attend un chasseur fort capable de se battre à armes égales contre lui.

Lorsqu’il s’est lassé de ces combats répétitifs, il a commencé à s’intéresser au monde de l’humanité grâce aux trophées qu’il avait obtenus des chasseurs morts.

Dans le même temps, il fut de plus en plus fasciné par l’existence des humains lorsque le puissant chasseur dont il avait toujours rêvé apparut devant lui.

Finalement, Baphomet essaie de devenir lui-même un humain…

altTitles.ja-ro: 叛逆（はんぎゃく）のニジガサキ

altTitles.ja: 反逆のニジガサキ

description.en: Hangyaku no Nijigasaki (Nijigasaki of the Rebellion) is an official Love Live! manga by Choboraunyopomi featuring the cast of Love Live!'s Nijigasaki High School Idol Club.
description.es-la: Las locuras y bizarras jornadas de Nijigasaki, ahora llegan en formato manga. Sigue las rebeldes aventuras de Setsuna Yuki y el Club Escolar Idol de Nijigasaki en Hangyaku no Nijigasaki.

altTitles.en: A Rough Lady is All Bothered

altTitles.ja: あらくれお嬢様はもんもんしている

description.en:
Meet Tsubaki Kuchinashi, the Manhater Prince. Beautiful and popular, Tsubaki's core strength in high school comes from her position as the principal's granddaughter - suffice it to say, but any student or teacher who even looks at her the wrong way could be expelled at a moment's notice.   
  
Meet Tadashi Kiritsu, the head of the Public Morals Committee. As sharp and rigid as his glasses, Tadashi despises Kuchinashi's iron grip on the school. Naturally, a challenge to her rule bothers Kuchinashi, so she decides to get rid of him as soon as possible. Her plan? Get him in a honey trap. However, that's easier said than done, as she starts finding hidden aspects of herself that she didn't want to acknowledge, either to herself or to Tadashi.  
  
Will she prevail before her conscience eats her up from her own salacious taunts? Will Tadashi play into her hands? What manner of a person will he prove himself to be when facing her taunts?
description.ja: 私ばっかりもんもんするのは絶対おかしい‥‥。目障りな風紀委員・起立匡史(きりつただし)を退学させるため、口無椿(くちなしつばき)お嬢様はご自分のお色気でヤツを陥れることに。ですが、ナイスバディなお嬢様のお色気が起立に全く効きません。逆に、椿様の方がもんもんしてしまうのです。

title.en: The Blood Princess and the Knight

altTitles.ja: 血の姫と騎士

description.en:
I, who was a sacred knight, was defeated and captured in a battle against the vampire clan.   
"Oh? Letting you die? In your dreams! Accept my embrace, and in the future, please take care of me, my lovely daughter~"   
The silver-haired Queen of the Vampire Clan lifted my chin and smiled cunningly, her sharp canines drawing closer to my neck…

altTitles.ja: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！外伝　廣井きくりの深酒日記

altTitles.en: Bocchi the Rock! Side Story: Hiroi Kikuri's Heavy Drinking Diary

altTitles.ru: Одинокий Рокер! Спин-офф: Дневник пьяницы Хирои Кикури

altTitles.vi: Bocchi the Rock! Ngoại Truyện: Nhật Ký Say Rượu của Hiroi Kikuri

altTitles.ja-ro: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden: Hiroi Kikuri no Fukazake Nikki

description.en: Kikuri Hiroi (25 years old). She is a "genius bassist" who leads the indie band "SICK HACK", and she loves alcohol. She often gets drunk and breaks the equipment of the live house, so she seems to be short of money. She lives in a 52-year-old apartment without a bath, and sometimes borrows showers from her friends and acquaintances. She is regularly attacked by anxiety about her future, which she counters with a "happiness spiral" with the help of alcohol. What is her daily life like...?!

altTitles.ja: ルリドラゴン

description.en:
Ruri, a high school student, woke up one morning to find that she had suddenly grown horns on her head!

Her mother told her that she might have inherited it because her father is a dragon. Ruri's mother tells her that she might have inherited it from her father, and she is puzzled, but goes to school anyway....

Her classmates are curious about the spontaneous horn, and another dragon constitution is revealed!

With a slight change in the usual routine, the daily life of Dragon Girl Ruri begins!
description.tr: Tembellik ve çalışkanlık arasında git gel yaşayan ejder kızın gündelik maceraları.
description.pt-br: Ruri Aoki é uma garota normal que um dia acorda com um par de chifres em sua cabeça. De acordo com sua mãe, o pai de Ruri, que ela nunca conheceu antes, é um dragão e Ruri só é metade humana. Esta é a história da jornada de autodescobrimento e aceitação de uma garota metade humana, metade dragão.

title.en: One Step Closer to the Demon King

altTitles.ja: 魔王まであと一歩

altTitles.id: Aku Raja Lautan tapi jadi Gembel

altTitles.en: Even the Demon King, One Step at a Time
One Step to Being Dark Lord
One Step to the Demon King
One Step for the Dark Lord

description.en:
This is no different from ordinary villager life...
"There can be no one stronger than me in this world!"
To become the strongest, Yuria, the Sea Queen, went ashore in search of the Demon King. But when she looked at her reflection, she saw the face of a child. In exchange for her legs, she lost all her strength... Even so, still striving to become the strongest, Yuria begins a painful journey!

description.id:
[ "Hanya saja... aku jadi tidak ada bedanya dengan penduduk desa..." ] "Tidak boleh ada makhluk yang lebih kuat dariku di dunia ini!" Untuk menjadi yang terkuat, Yuria, Raja Lautan, datang ke daratan untuk mencari Raja Iblis terkuat. Namun, saat melihat ke cermin, dia melihat wajah anak kecil...? Sebagai ganti kaki, dia telah kehilangan seluruh kekuatannya. Meskipun begitu, ia masih mengincar posisi teratas di dunia! Perjalanannya yang penuh air mata dimulai!

뭍으로 나온 바다의 왕 "유리아"

description.ru:
Это… Ничем не отличается от деревенской жизни... В этом мире не может быть существа сильнее меня!” Чтобы стать сильнейшей, Юрия, Морская Королева, вышла на сушу в поисках Короля Демонов. Но… Посмотрев на свое отражение, она увидела лицо ребенка... В обмен на ноги она потеряла все свои силы... Даже так, все еще стремясь стать сильнейшей, начинается мучительное путешествие Юрии!

description.zh:
深海女王无奈变成小孩？
落魄海王的陆地称霸之旅！
大海之王友丽亚为了称霸天下，特地上岸来到陆地上寻找魔王一决胜负。可上岸后才发现，自己失去了所有的力量，而且还变成了小孩子？为了称霸天下，友丽亚辛酸的崭新旅程就此拉开帷幕！

description.en: When Sora enters high school, his homeroom teacher is a sexy gal with huge breasts and she’s none other than the changed version of Suzune, the innocent girl next door who was his first love! As the teacher’s “educational guidance” escalates day by day, Sora is awakened to pleasures he’s never known before…!
description.ja:
ドSギャルの体育教師に、俺が開発されていく‥‥っ！

高校に入学した宙＜そら＞の担任は、爆乳で超セクシーな黒ギャル教師。それは、初恋の清楚な隣のお姉さん・すずねの変わり果てた姿だった！日々エスカレートする先生の「教育的指導」。宙は今まで知らなかった快感に目覚めてしまい‥‥！？

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 第4部 ダイヤモンドは砕けない カラー版

description.en: In April 1999, Jotaro Kujo travels to a town in Japan called Morioh to find a young man named Josuke Higashikata, the secret love child of his grandfather, Joseph Joestar. Upon finding him, Jotaro is surprised to learn that Josuke also possesses a Stand. After their strange meeting, the pair team up to investigate the town’s proliferation of unusual Stands!

Ever since Kang Seol was a child, he's had strange dreams where he and several people wear masks while playing "World of Eternity," a board game full of quests and adventures. And although Seol was great at the game, he was never able to win. But now, his dreams have become reality, and humans have become game pieces!

Humanity's only hope is for Seol to recall what he did in his dreams to survive. Even though he's never won, will he be able to turn the tables and finally make his way to victory?
description.ru:
Когда я был маленьким, в своих сновидениях я попадал в иное пространство, так называемый «мир вечности». 
 Во сне я превращался во взрослого человека, одетого в причудливые одежду и маску.
 Теперь пришло время бросать кость. Игра «Мир вечности» , начавшаяся с броска костей , была судьбой? Жизнью? Или, может быть, самим миром?
 Я с удовольствием проводил время, играя в кругу незнакомых мне личностей. Пока однажды я сам не стал фигурой на игровом поле.

description.en:
Han Jiwon, a retired gymnast due to an injury. 
Kwon Jungwoo, a confident and lenient basketball player was his idol. However, it didn't take long for his admiration to turn to love...

altTitles.th: ชายเลวหมื่นลี้ทานตะวัน

altTitles.ja: 負けヒロイン救済計画

description.en:
Why torment scumbags for just a moment when you can do so forever? Join Su LuXia as she transmigrates into countless worlds with her ‘Supporting Female Character’s Counterattack System’ to unleash vengeance upon the deplorable male and female leads using a variety of tactics! 

Su LuXia: "The only thing that brings me comfort is the tears of remorse from scumbag men and the agonizing groans of despicable women who can't get what they want." 

System: "Has My Esteemed Host learnt to reel back her vengeful spirit? Nope, I guess not."
description.fr:
Su Lüxia fait partie d'un "Système de rôle féminin".
Sa mission : en se téléportant dans les corps des femmes trompées et bafouées, elle renverse leur destinée.
"Seules les larmes d'un bâtard de tricheur et les gémissements de douleur d'une garce m'apportent le réconfort."
description.it:
Schiacciare un verme per un solo momento dà una soddisfazione momentanea, ma le vite passate a schiacciare i vermi forniscono vite di soddisfazione continua. Su Lüxia, la nostra protagonista femminile, trasmigra in altri mondi con il sistema di contrattacco della seconda protagonista femminile; usa schemi e trucchi elaborati per picchiare innumerevoli bastardi traditori e puttane.

Su Lüxia: "Solo le lacrime di rimorso di un bastardo traditore, e i gemiti di dolore di una puttana incapace di ottenere ciò che vuole, mi danno conforto."

Sistema: "Il mio ospite ha attinto alla sua umanità oggi? No."

title.en: The Hero is Beating Up the Bullies

description.en:
The Hero, who defeated the Demon King and saved the world, is being summoned to a shitty delinquent school?!

The otherworld Hero who was summoned to a den filled with the worst bullies ever, the ‘Southern Suseong High’.

Though the Hero doesn’t use his powers against fellow humans, he begins to school these bullies after finding out about their ‘demonic’ nature…!

Can the Hero defeat the bullies and return back to his world?

altTitles.ja: 恋喰少女

description.en: High school student Ooishi Kyou is afraid of women. Suddenly, five girls confessed to him. Among them, four are creatures called Koibami - beings that devour human romantic feelings. If he has his romantic feelings eaten by these girls, he will never be able to love again. However, he cannot abandon the feelings of the one who confessed to him for real - Kyou decides to find the one he truly loves among the five!
description.ja:
本物の恋心を、あなたは見抜けるか。

女性を恐れる男子高校生・大石饗。彼に突然告白してきた、5人の少女。そのうち4人は、人間の恋愛感情を喰らう生物「恋喰（こいばみ）」。彼女たちに恋愛感情を食べられると、二度と恋をすることができなくなってしまう。ただ、本当の告白をした1人の気持ちを、見捨てるわけにはいかない――饗は覚悟を決め、5人の中から、本命の1人を見つけだすことを決意する！
description.es-la: Oishi Kyou es un chico que siempre ha tenido un fuerte miedo a las chicas. Cuando comienza su primer día de clases en la preparatoria, se ve abrumado al recibir confesiones de amor por parte de cinco chicas diferentes. Sin embargo, descubre que cuatro de ellas son en realidad chicas ‘Devoradoras de Amor’, chicas que buscan seducir a los hombres para alimentarse de sus sentimientos, y sus presas favoritas son los sentimientos del ‘Primer Amor’, gracias a cierta persona el Protagonista sabe que 4 chicas de primer año son ‘Devoradoras de Amor’ así que, dentro de estas 5 chicas hay una que se confesó realmente a Oishi, así que se propone a encontrar a la única chica entre las 5 que realmente lo ama, todo sea antes de que devoren sus sentimientos.
description.pt-br:
O estudante do ensino médio, Kyo Oishi, tem medo de mulheres.
 
De repente, cinco garotas se declaram para ele. Entre elas, quatro são criaturas chamadas Devoradoras de Amor - seres que devoram sentimentos românticos humanos. Se ele tiver seus sentimentos românticos consumidos por essas garotas, ele nunca mais será capaz de amar novamente.
 
No entanto, ele não pode abandonar os sentimentos daquela que se declarou para ele de verdade - Kyo decide encontrar a única que realmente ama ele entre as cinco! Começa uma comédia romântica de suspense que balança o cérebro!

altTitles.ja: 二度と自撮り送ってやんない！

altTitles.en: I'll never send a selfie again!

altTitles.ru: Я больше никогда не буду отправлять тебе селфи!

description.en: My childhood friend keeps asking me for a selfie to use as a reference for his drawing, what do I do?
description.ja: 久しぶりに連絡を寄こした幼馴染の影介。漫画の作画資料用にわたしの自撮り写真を送ってほしんだって。成長していろいろ変わった私を見て驚け・・・て、ありがとう以外のこと何か言えないの⁉　恥ずかしいのを我慢して撮っているのに！気になり始めた幼馴染同士の自撮りコミュニケーション・ラブコメ！
description.es-la: Mi amigo de la infancia no deja de pedirme una selfie para usarlo como referencia para su dibujo, ¿Qué hago?

altTitles.ja: はらぺこ母娘と元カレ家主

altTitles.ja-ro: Hara peko Oyako to Motokare Yanushi

altTitles.en: A Hungry Mother and Daughter and Her Ex-Boyfriend Landlord

altTitles.pt-br: Uma mãe faminta, sua filha e seu ex-namorado proprietário

description.en:
36-year-old Takaharu lives alone. After graduating from Art College, he has been living a quiet life while painting pictures. 

One day, his ex-girlfriend Kyou, whom he broke up with 17 years ago, comes to him with her daughter Minori and asks him to let them stay at his place. As in their college days, 

Kyou is attracted by the delicious food, and so the three of them begin to live together!
description.ja: 36歳のたかはるは一人暮らし。美大を卒業後、ほそぼそと絵を描いて暮らしていた。そんなある日、17年前に別れた元カノ・キョウが娘のみのりを連れてやってきて「居候をさせて欲しい」という。大学時代同様においしい食べ物につられたキョウにほだされ、三人での生活が始まるが……？
description.pt-br: Takaharu, de 36 anos, mora sozinho. Depois de se formar na Art College, ele vive uma vida tranquila enquanto pinta quadros. Um dia, sua ex-namorada Kyou, com quem ele terminou há 17 anos, vem até ele com sua filha Minori e pede que ele as deixe ficar em sua casa. Assim como nos tempos de faculdade, Kyou se sente atraída pela comida deliciosa, e assim os três passam a morar juntos.
